<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Commenced declassification of our board of
directors</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Added nine new directors, five with extensive oil and gas industry experience</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Separated the roles of CEO and Chairman, with
Mark Williams serving as <FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">non-executive</FONT> Chairman</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adopted a mandatory director retirement policy</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Board resolved to recommend that stockholders approve amendments to the certificate of incorporation and bylaws to eliminate supermajority provisions at the 2014 annual
meeting</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Summary of Hess&#146; 2013 Executive Compensation Program</I></B>. A summary of our
executive compensation program during 2013 is provided below. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="33%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="6%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="32%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="8%"></TD>
<TD></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d">
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">Compensation Element</FONT></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">Purpose</FONT></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">2013 Result</FONT></B></FONT></TD></TR>


<TR BGCOLOR="#edf9d8">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Base Salary &#150; Fixed
Pay</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Fixed rate of pay</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reflective of skills, experience and market practice.</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" align="left"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No increase for CEO. Among other NEOs,<BR>increases ranged from 1.6% to 3.4%.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Cash Bonus Plan
(CBP)</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Annual target opportunities</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Payout from 0-150% of target</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Provides an annual cash incentive opportunity, with payout that varies based on performance versus pre-established goals
at the enterprise, business unit, and individual levels.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Metrics and goals are intended to tie payouts to short-term business strategy.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Since the company has gone through a transformation, the CBP was redesigned for 2014.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1/3 Enterprise Results</FONT></P><BR> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:0px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Net income</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom:0px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1/3 Business Unit Results</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:0px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Profitability, cost control, and safety</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom:0px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">1/3 Individual Results</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P>
<P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Among ongoing NEOs, CBP payments<BR>averaged 116.8% of target (detail provided<BR>below). For one retiring NEO, payment was<BR>100% of
target.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#edf9d8">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Long-term Incentives
(LTI)</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#edf9d8">
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance&nbsp;Share&nbsp;Units (PSUs) (50%)</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150; Payout from 0-200% of target</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:7px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Restricted Stock
(50%)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Encourages sustained performance to achieve targeted shareholder returns, with
an emphasis on outperformance compared to peers.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Supports long-term retention of top talent.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">At-risk based three-year TSR performance<BR>compared to peers. PSU performance<BR>periods
have not yet ended.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" align="left">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No increase in grant
date value of 2013 LTI<BR>awards from 2012 levels.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Pay Mix</I></B>. The majority of NEO pay is variable pay (i.e., compensation other
than base salary). For 2013, 78% to 89% of target total direct compensation of our CEO and other NEOs was variable. This directly ties their pay to our company&#146;s performance, both retrospectively and prospectively, including financial results,
strategic initiatives, and stock performance. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g692135g44p56.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">25 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Pay vs. Performance Alignment (Realizable
Compensation).</I></B>&nbsp;&nbsp;A comparison of realizable pay to target pay (grant date opportunity) and TSR illustrates how performance outcomes have impacted pay over time. The graph below shows the average realizable pay of the CEO for each of
the three-year periods ending December&nbsp;31, 2011, 2012 and 2013, and the correlation with the indexed TSR of Hess common stock. As shown below, realizable CEO compensation is sensitive to TSR, indicating alignment with our stockholders.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g692135g48n64.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Grant date opportunity reflects the average of salary, target cash bonus, and fair market value of equity awards, as reported in the Grants of Plan
Based Awards Table, for each respective year. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Realizable pay reflects the average of salary, cash bonus, and the intrinsic value of stock options, the market value of restricted stock, and
market value of PSUs based on 2012 and 2013 performance, in each case awarded in each of these three-year periods. Stock options, restricted stock, and PSUs are valued at year-end 2011, 2012 and 2013 closing prices of Hess common stock.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(3)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">For more information on total compensation as calculated under SEC rules, see the narrative and notes accompanying the 2013 Summary Compensation
Table on page 42. The amount reported as realizable compensation differs substantially from the amounts reported as total compensation in the 2011-13 Summary Compensation Tables and are not a substitute for those amounts.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2013 Say on Pay Vote and Changes for 2014 </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">At our 2013 Annual Stockholders Meeting, approximately 70% of votes cast (76% including shares that were cast
&#147;FOR&#148; but were received after closing of the polls) supported Hess&#146; executive compensation program. These results were below the level that we deem satisfactory. Following our stockholders&#146; 2013 advisory Say on Pay vote, we
undertook a multi-pronged effort to review our executive compensation programs, which included an enhanced outreach program with our institutional stockholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Our CEO and other members of senior management, often accompanied by our non-executive Chairman, conducted a broad outreach effort which included
nearly 150&nbsp;institutional stockholders representing &#150; in the aggregate &#150; over 50% of our outstanding shares. The purpose of this outreach was to discuss and solicit stockholder views on our strategic plan, corporate governance and
other matters of concern, including executive compensation. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In addition, in January 2014 legal and human resource executives conducted a focused outreach to several of our top institutional stockholders
representing &#150; in the aggregate&nbsp;&#150; about 22% of our outstanding shares. The purpose of this outreach was to discuss recent and contemplated changes in executive compensation as we transition to a pure play E&amp;P company, and to
solicit feedback. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">26 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Senior management and the committee analyzed and discussed what we learned
in this review process. Based upon this feedback and in connection with our transformation to a pure-play E&amp;P company, we have made changes to our executive compensation program for 2014 outlined below. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="31%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="65%"></TD></TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#26962d">
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">Feedback We Received</FONT></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">Changes We&#146;ve Made For 2014</FONT></B></FONT></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="3"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Compensation Philosophy</I></B></FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Prefer a market median target pay
position, for commensurate performance.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>We target total direct compensation
(base / cash bonus / long-term incentives) within a competitive range of market median. </B>Sustained performance may be recognized in individual pay components, and pay may vary above or below target based on performance outcomes.
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="31%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="65%"></TD></TR>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Cash Bonus Plan</I></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Increase the
weighting of enterprise results and consider reducing weighting of individual performance in NEO payment determinations.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2013
weighting: 1/3 enterprise, 1/3 business unit, and 1/3 individual)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Redesigned CBP for 2014, with funding based on
enterprise results. </B>Payout can range from 0 to 175% of target based on attainment of enterprise metrics. A multiplier can adjust the bonus down to zero or up 25% (capped at 200%) based on individual performance results vs. pre-defined individual
goals. This results in an increased weighting on formulaic enterprise results, and a decreased weighting on individual results.</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Incorporate performance metrics that reflect go-forward strategy
&#150; and operational success &#150; as a pure play company, that are less influenced by change in commodity prices.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Certain
investors were particularly interested in including a return on capital-based metric.</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(current enterprise performance metric is
net income)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>2014 CBP includes six enterprise-wide performance metrics
&#150; with pre-defined threshold, target, and maximum performance goals &#150; that will indicate operational success</B>:</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;Safety</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;Proved reserve additions</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;Production</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;Controllable operated cash costs</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;E&amp;P Capital and exploratory spend</FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:2.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#150;Cash return on capital employed</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Increase transparency of annual CEO compensation
decisions relating to individual performance.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px" BGCOLOR="#edf9d8"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Implemented a new CEO performance assessment
framework</B>. Success will be measured against pre-defined goals. The 2015 proxy statement will discuss individual performance in the context of this framework.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="31%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="65%"></TD></TR>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Long Term Incentives</I></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Some investors do not view restricted
stock as performance-based LTI.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Increased the performance-based component of LTI from 50% to 80% in value.</B> For 2014 LTI awards, we changed the LTI award value mix
from 50% performance share units (PSUs) and 50% restricted stock to 60% PSUs, 20% stock options, and 20% restricted stock. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">For
2014 PSUs, we increased the relative performance required for target and maximum payout: target from 53</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">rd</SUP></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"> to 55</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">th</SUP></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
percentile and maximum from 80</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">th</SUP></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"> to 91</FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="1"><SUP STYLE="vertical-align:baseline; position:relative; bottom:.8ex">st</SUP></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">
percentile.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="31%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="65%"></TD></TR>

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><I>Peer Group</I></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Reconsider peer group composition, given
change in strategy and size of Hess after transformation to a pure play E&amp;P company.</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Modified our
peer group for 2014.</B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#150;&nbsp;&nbsp;Median peer revenue now $14.6&nbsp;billion
(vs. $24.5&nbsp;billion), and median market capitalization now $25.1 billion (vs. $76.7 billion)</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&#150;&nbsp;&nbsp;Focused composition on pure play E&amp;P companies and removed large integrated companies</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The impact of the changes outlined above will be reflected in the 2014 summary
compensation table reported in our 2015 proxy statement. These changes will not be reflected in this year&#146;s summary compensation table because many of the decisions related to fiscal 2013 compensation reported in this proxy statement were made
before our 2013 advisory vote on executive compensation occurred and before this extensive stockholder outreach and pay program review effort was conducted. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">27 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Process for Determining Compensation and Role of Compensation Consultants </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The committee has exclusive authority for approving the compensation of the CEO and the other NEOs. Human resources
management, acting under the supervision of the CEO, develops compensation recommendations for all officers and employees, including the NEOs, in accordance with the compensation philosophy and policies more fully described elsewhere in this
CD&amp;A. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">To assist in its review of the compensation recommendations, in 2013 the committee directly engaged
the firm Pay Governance LLC (&#147;Pay Governance&#148;) as its independent compensation consultant. In January 2014, the committee determined to change its advisor and engaged the firm Semler Brossy Consulting Group LLC (&#147;Semler Brossy&#148;)
as its independent compensation consultant. Both Pay Governance and Semler Brossy reported exclusively to the committee, which has sole authority to engage, dismiss and approve the terms of engagement of its consultant. During 2013, Pay Governance
did not provide any additional services to the company. While Semler Brossy was principally retained to advise on 2014 compensation decisions, their consultants also provided advice on cash bonus payments that were made in 2014 related to fiscal
2013 performance. The committee assessed the independence of Pay Governance and Semler Brossy pursuant to SEC and NYSE rules and concluded that no conflict of interest exists. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">The compensation consultant&#146;s principal responsibility is to advise the committee on compensation recommendations for
the NEOs, as well as on general matters relating to executive compensation strategy and programs. Although the consultant interacts with senior executives in our human resources, finance and legal departments, and with senior management in
developing compensation recommendations, the consultant meets privately with the committee when advising on compensation levels for the CEO and the other NEOs. Final decisions on compensation for these individuals are made solely by the committee.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Compensation recommendations are reviewed annually by the committee, usually at a March meeting. The CEO meets
with the committee and the compensation consultant to discuss performance objectives and review compensation recommendations for executive officers directly reporting to him, including the other NEOs. Thereafter, the committee meets privately with
the independent compensation consultant to review the compensation recommendations. The committee then determines compensation for the CEO and other NEOs, taking into account the advice of the independent compensation consultant and in accordance
with the compensation objectives and policies described in this compensation discussion and analysis. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In
addition, during 2013 management retained Compensation Advisory Partners LLC (&#147;CAP&#148;) as its executive compensation consultant to advise management on general matters related to executive compensation strategy and program design. CAP also
worked with management to enhance the framework used for individual performance evaluation. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In accordance with
its charter, the corporate governance and nominating committee periodically reviews and determines appropriate levels of compensation for directors. To assist in conducting this review and making these determinations, this committee has in the past
engaged a consultant, Mercer Human Resources Consulting (&#147;Mercer&#148;), to compile comparative data and make recommendations. Mercer did not provide any data or advice to the committee during 2013. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>Total Compensation &#150; Objectives, Philosophy, and Key Practices </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B></B><B><I>Objectives</I></B><B></B>. The objective of our executive compensation programs is to attract and retain
talented executives and motivate them to achieve our business goals through a combination of cash and stock-based compensation. The principal elements of an executive&#146;s total compensation consist of: <B> </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">base salary, </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">cash bonus, and </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="5%"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="3" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"></FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="1%" VALIGN="top"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">long-term incentives. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">28 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">We also review other elements of compensation, including retirement
benefits, life insurance, savings, health and welfare plans and other benefits offered to employees generally in order to evaluate the entire compensation package offered to executives. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Total Direct Compensation Philosophy</I></B>. Generally, our objective is to deliver competitive total direct
compensation, consisting of cash salary, cash bonus and long-term equity compensation, if specified corporate and business unit performance metrics and individual performance objectives are met. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">During 2013, we considered competitive total direct compensation to be at or above that paid to executive officers
performing similar functions at a majority of companies in our peer group. Going forward, overall, we intend to target 2014 total direct compensation for our NEOs within a competitive range of market median, with the opportunity for sustained
performance to be recognized in individual pay components. Pay may vary above or below target based on actual performance outcomes. Variations in total direct compensation among the NEOs reflect differences in competitive pay for their respective
positions as well as the size and complexity of the business units or functions they oversee, the performance of those business units or functions, and individual performance. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Key Compensation Practices</I></B>. Key executive compensation practices are summarized below. We believe these
practices promote alignment with the interests of our stockholders.<B><I></I></B><I> </I><B><I> </I></B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="90%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="93%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="3" NOWRAP ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:2px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px; padding-right:8px">
<P STYLE="border-bottom:1px solid #21a32b;width:65pt" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#21a32b"><B>What We Do</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B>Directly link pay to performance outcomes, operational results and stockholder returns</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Engage in ongoing dialogue with stockholders to incorporate feedback into our compensation programs</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Target total direct compensation (base / cash bonus / long-term incentives) within a competitive range of market
median</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Use a structured approach to CEO performance evaluation and related compensation decisions</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Maintain a cap on CEO incentive compensation payments</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Emphasize a culture of safety (a weighted metric in the bonus program for all employees)</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Have stringent stock ownership guidelines for NEOs</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Design compensation plans with provisions to mitigate undue risk</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Maintain a compensation clawback policy, which includes recoupment and forfeiture provisions</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Have an anti-hedging policy and an anti-pledging policy for all executives</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Review share utilization annually</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Limit perquisites to executives</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Offer executives the same health and welfare benefit and savings programs as other salaried employees</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Devote significant time to management succession and leadership development efforts</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Include criteria in incentive compensation plans to maximize tax deductibility</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#21a32b"><FONT
STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">&#252;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="90%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">

<TD WIDTH="4%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="93%"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="3" NOWRAP ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:2px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px; padding-right:8px">
<P STYLE="border-bottom:1px solid #bc0000;width:96pt" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3" COLOR="#bc0000"><B>What We Don&#146;t Do</B></FONT></P></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#bc0000">x</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No employment contract for CEO</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#bc0000">x</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No payment of dividends or dividend equivalents on unearned restricted shares or PSUs</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#bc0000">x</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No excise tax gross-ups in change-in-control agreements beginning in 2010</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#bc0000">x</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No re-pricing of underwater stock options without stockholder approval</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:2px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:2px solid #000000; padding-left:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#bc0000">x</FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:2px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:2px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:2px solid #000000; padding-right:8px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">No excessive severance or change in control benefits</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">29 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B>2013 Total Direct Compensation </B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">We structure total direct compensation to the NEOs so that the majority of this compensation is delivered in the form of
equity awards in order to provide incentives to work toward the growth of long-term profitability that will enhance stockholder returns. We also structure NEOs&#146; cash compensation so that a significant portion is at risk under the company&#146;s
CBP, payable based on corporate, business unit and individual performance. In the following sections, we further detail each component of total direct compensation. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Base Salary</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;We review base salaries annually, but we do not necessarily award salary increases
each year. In determining base salary levels for executive officers, the committee considers the following qualitative and quantitative factors: job level and responsibilities, relevant experience, individual performance, recent corporate and
business unit performance, internal equity, and our objective of paying competitive total direct compensation if performance is met. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">From time to time base salaries may be adjusted other than as a result of an annual review, in order to address competitive pressures or in connection with a promotion. In March&nbsp;2013, the committee
decided not to increase Mr.&nbsp;Hess&#146; salary for the fifth consecutive year. The committee approved limited salary increases for the other NEOs. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="46%"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="9%"></TD>
<TD></TD>

<TD></TD>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT

STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">2012</FONT></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" COLSPAN="2" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff">2013</FONT></B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Annual Cash Bonus</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;We establish a cash bonus target
for each executive officer based upon his or her position within the company, responsibility and competitive cash bonus opportunity for similar positions in other companies. Actual payouts may range from 0% to 150% of the target cash bonus
opportunity based on actual performance outcomes. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">$500,000</FONT><BR> <P STYLE="margin-bottom:1px; margin-top:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><I>(65% of salary)</I></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">$750,000</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">30 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">In March 2014, the committee decided to reduce Mr.&nbsp;Hess&#146; cash
bonus target for 2014 from 217% to 150% of salary &#150; from $3.25 to $2.25 million &#150; and correspondingly increase the value of his target LTI award for 2015 by $1 million, so that more of Mr.&nbsp;Hess&#146; total direct compensation will be
at risk based on the company&#146;s long-term performance. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>2013 CBP
Design</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The annual CBP for executive officers, including the NEOs, is based on metrics aligned with the company&#146;s business strategy using an equal weighting of corporate, business unit and individual performance
metrics. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">


<TR>
<TD WIDTH="40%"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="2%"></TD>
<TD></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" WIDTH="1%"></TD>
<TD WIDTH="49%"></TD></TR>


<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(2/3) Based on</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>formulaic result</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #26962d"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #26962d; padding-right:8px"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1/3)&nbsp;corporate&nbsp;performance&nbsp;
metric&nbsp;&#150;&nbsp;Net&nbsp;income</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1/3) specified business unit metrics</FONT></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="middle"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>(1/3) Based on assessment of</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B><FONT STYLE="white-space:nowrap">performance&nbsp;vs.&nbsp;pre-established&nbsp;
goals</FONT></B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #26962d"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="middle" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #26962d; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #26962d; padding-right:8px">
<P STYLE="margin-left:1.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"></FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;(1/3) individual performance goals</FONT></P></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">CBP weightings link two-thirds of the bonus to formulaic measures of business performance
and one-third of the bonus to an assessment of individual performance against goals set at the beginning of the year. Payouts may range from 0% to 150% of the target bonus, depending upon the percent of attainment of the corporate and business unit
performance measures and, with respect to the individual performance component, depending upon the committee&#146;s determination of the percent of attainment of the individual performance measures. Payouts to the NEOs for corporate and business
unit performance are shown in column (g), and payouts for individual performance are included in column (d), of the Summary Compensation Table. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:12px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Illustration of 2013 CBP Design </B></FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(Business Unit Performance Reflects
E&amp;P) </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center">


<IMG SRC="g692135g85v88.jpg" ALT="LOGO">
 </P> <P STYLE="line-height:8px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:2px;border-bottom:0.5pt solid #000000;width:13%">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(1)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Represents individual metrics established for each executive officer. </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P STYLE="font-size:3px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="3%" VALIGN="top" ALIGN="left"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">(2)</FONT></TD>
<TD ALIGN="left" VALIGN="top"> <P ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2">Based on performance objectives established in the beginning of the fiscal year using a 5-point scale (1 = did not meet expectations, 2 = met most
expectations, 3 = met expectations, 4 = exceeded expectations, 5 = significantly exceeded expectations). </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">31 </FONT></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Determination of Corporate and Business Unit Performance Metrics</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The specific targeted levels of
corporate and business unit performance to be attained are established with the intention of motivating superior financial and operating performance compared with that of our peers and are described on page 33. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Our 2013 corporate performance metric was net income before after-tax interest expense and items affecting comparability

<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>Assessment of Individual Performance</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;Normally, we
assess individual performance based on goals set at the beginning of each year, specific to each NEO. Following year-end, achievement of these pre-defined individual goals is assessed. The CEO conducts performance reviews for the other NEOs and
makes compensation recommendations to the committee based on these reviews, with the committee making the final determination. The committee reviews the CEO&#146;s attainment of his individual performance objectives. This individual performance
assessment for each NEO influences the individual performance component of his or her annual cash bonus payout, and can also influence the grant-date value of LTI compensation and base salary adjustments for the subsequent year. The target LTI value
for any NEO can be adjusted down to zero or increased by up to 25%, aligned with the result of each individual performance assessment. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT
STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For 2013, in order to further focus NEOs on achievement of the strategic plan, the committee determined to base the individual component of the CBP on shared goals for all the NEOs &#150; how successfully
the strategic plan was executed during 2013. Detail regarding the factors that were considered as part of this performance assessment is reflected below. The company&#146;s progress in achieving these goals is highlighted in the table on page 24.
</FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="68%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE" ALIGN="center">

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B>Strategic Initiatives</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B><B>Become Focused Pure Play E&amp;P Company</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B><B>Exit Downstream</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B><B>Maximize Hess Asset Sales Proceeds</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B><B>Increase Current Returns to Stockholders</B></FONT></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:6px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:1px; margin-left:3.00em; text-indent:-1.00em"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B></FONT><FONT
STYLE="font-family:WINGDINGS" SIZE="2" COLOR="#000000">&#159;</FONT><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B></B><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</B><B>Strengthen Financial Flexibility</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2"></TD>

<TD VALIGN="top"> <P STYLE="margin-left:0.50em" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2"><B>Committee Assessment &#150; Performance vs. Goals</B></FONT></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD HEIGHT="5"></TD>
<TD HEIGHT="5" COLSPAN="2" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-TOP:1px solid #000000; BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" BGCOLOR="#26962d" STYLE="BORDER-LEFT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom" ALIGN="center" STYLE="BORDER-RIGHT:1px solid #000000; BORDER-BOTTOM:1px solid #000000" BGCOLOR="#26962d"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="2" COLOR="#ffffff"><B>Exceeded Expectations</B></FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">Given the significant transformational objectives set for 2013, and in view of the
substantial accomplishments against these objectives, the committee determined that the individual component of the 2013 CBP would pay out at 140% of target for all ongoing NEOs. For Mr.&nbsp;Walker, who retired from Hess effective January&nbsp;1,
2014, the committee determined to fix his total 2013 bonus payment at 100% of target. The committee also decided to pay Mr.&nbsp;Rielly a bonus of $200,000 in addition to a $583,833 payout pursuant to the 2013 CBP, in recognition of his work and
leadership with respect to asset divestures, as well as increased responsibilities he assumed in 2013. </FONT></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:6px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3"><B><I>LTI Program Structure</I></B>.&nbsp;&nbsp;The company believes that LTI compensation is an important incentive and
retention tool. Therefore, it is the largest portion of each executive officer&#146;s total compensation package. For the past two years, the committee has awarded 50% in value of LTI shares in the form of performance share units (PSUs) and 50% in
the form of restricted stock. Payout of PSUs is dependent on the company&#146;s relative TSR compared with that of our peer companies, identified below, over a three-year period. In addition, our TSR must be positive during the three-year
performance period for payout to exceed target, even if Hess outperforms peers. </FONT></P>
 <p STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;</FONT></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px" ALIGN="center"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">34 </FONT></P>



<p Style='page-break-before:always'>
<HR  SIZE="3" style="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<h5 align="left"><a href="#toc">Table of Contents</a></h5>

 <P STYLE="margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px; text-indent:5%" ALIGN="justify"><FONT STYLE="font-family:Times New Roman" SIZE="3">For 2014 LTI awards, we modified our approach for NEOs by decreasing the
weighting on time-based restricted stock, increasing the weighting on PSUs, and re-introducing stock options. This change increased the performance-based component of our LTI awards from 50% to 80% in value, which the committee believed would
further reinforce the alignment of interests of our senior-most management and stockholders. </FONT></P> <P STYLE="font-size:12px;margin-top:0px;margin-bottom:0px">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:2px solid #21a32b"><FONT SIZE="1">&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
